en.e9254634af387d0c324cc05f8ba23e12: This is a modified version of the Index of Similes from Access to Insight. We adapt this useful resource with gratitude. Changes include:
en.a52884d4949311176c9a0cc75030ca98: Removing all later texts and references, retaining only references directly to the early texts.
en.af2b95d00c342b56a096393936671a35: In a few cases, terminology and definitions have been changed, corrected, or deleted. However, the bulk of the content is identical.
en.debe501e7f424ecb1df4631a6f56f149: In most cases, Access to Insight and SuttaCentral use the same reference conventions. However, in a few cases they differ; for example Sutta Nipāta is Sn in Access to Insight and Snp in SuttaCentral. In such cases the references have been changed to SuttaCentral’s system.
en.46d8b5b655fbb42ba4d5372da5301392: The caveats expressed by the author of the original index still apply:
en.3e4d8e1a9c902e8f50d2f30adb68e7b8: Only the imagery that illustrates points of Dhamma is included here; imagery that serves primarily a literary or narrative function is not included.
en.0abdaf0e93b1bd21a4a65abdd3e73e7e: References only include the Pali texts.
